text: @PrisonPlanet Bill Gates is working with the Chinese on developing a vaccine for the  coronavirus that will have a micro chip to track our movements. He wants this vaccine mandatory for all USA citizens. Gates cannot be trusted. He is a globalist. I will refuse a vaccine. We must fight back.
